meanings.definition: Marked by a scar or scars.
meanings.sent1: The scarred tree trunk stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Her scarred knee reminded her of the fall she had last week.
meanings.sent3: The scarred teddy bear looked like it had been on many adventures.
meanings.sent4: The scarred battlefield told stories of past battles.
meanings.sent5: The scarred face of the old pirate was a map of his adventures at sea.

meanings.definition: Showing lasting signs of damage or injury.
meanings.sent1: The scarred wall bore witness to the earthquake that shook the town.
meanings.sent2: His scarred heart healed over time after the painful breakup.
meanings.sent3: The scarred book cover hinted at the many times it had been dropped.
meanings.sent4: The scarred road stretched out before them, a reminder of the long journey ahead.
meanings.sent5: The scarred memories of the war haunted him in his dreams.
